name: Cyber Necromancer
description:
Defunct, defective, and thrown to scrapyard, you play as a Cyborg who is defying death itself. Using your wits, skills, and the weapons you find around, escape the clutches of this metallic planet by repairing your ship.

You will have to fight your way through four distinct futuristic regions, against metallic monstrosities and environmental hazards, will you escape death itself?

Game and all assets made by Terran Orion and Wesley Gilbert
